citation: COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Commercial Leases) (Financial Hardship Cessation Day) Notice 2021 (Tas)
text:
COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Commercial Leases) (Financial Hardship Cessation Day) Notice 2021

I make the following notice under section 31 of the COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Commercial Leases) Act 2020 .

28 January 2021

PETER GUTWEIN

Treasurer

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Commercial Leases) (Financial Hardship Cessation Day) Notice 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on 31 January 2021.

3. Financial hardship cessation day
    For the purposes of section 31 of the COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Commercial Leases) Act 2020 , 31 January 2021 is declared to be the financial hardship cessation day.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 January 2021

This notice is administered in the Department of Justice.
